name.title:
Name this is the name of the route to use for the mirroring of traffic this also needs
to be included in the `spec.strategy.canary.trafficRouting.managedRoutes` field

exact.title: Exact The string must match exactly

prefix.title: Prefix The string will be prefixed matched

regex.title: Regex The string will be regular expression matched

method.title: StringMatch Used to define what type of matching we will use exact, prefix, or regular expression

exact.title: Exact The string must match exactly

prefix.title: Prefix The string will be prefixed matched

regex.title: Regex The string will be regular expression matched

path.title: StringMatch Used to define what type of matching we will use exact, prefix, or regular expression

exact.title: Exact The string must match exactly

prefix.title: Prefix The string will be prefixed matched

regex.title: Regex The string will be regular expression matched

additionalProperties.title: StringMatch Used to define what type of matching we will use exact, prefix, or regular expression

headers.title:
Headers What request with matching headers should be mirrored
+optional

match.title:
Match Contains a list of rules that if mated will mirror the traffic to the services
+optional

percentage.title:
Services The list of services to mirror the traffic to if the method, path, headers match
Service string `json:"service" protobuf:"bytes,3,opt,name=service"`
Percentage What percent of the traffic that matched the rules should be mirrored
